channel.title: Make Money on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Make Money on 0x000216

item.title: Get Paid to Take a Cell Phone
item.description: Thinking about a new cell phone but don’t want to spend $100? You don’t have to! Getting a new phone doesn’t mean emptying your wallet. While discounts are common, you can even find completely free phones. It’s true that the newest smartphones can be expensive, but there are plenty of free options available. The key is to shop online instead of in retail stores. Online, you can browse cell phone deals and service plans at your own pace, without pressure from salespeople.

item.title: Youâ€™re Not Throwing Out That Cell Phone, Are You?
item.description: Seriously, don’t even think about throwing away that old cell phone, especially with the economy the way it is. It might not make calls anymore, but it’s still worth money. You wouldn’t throw cash in the trash, would you? People trash millions of dollars worth of old electronics every year because they don’t realize their value. Selling it yourself seems like a hassle, but it can be easy! Some phones, especially smartphones, are worth a significant amount of money.

item.title: Sell Your Old or Broken Laptop For Cash
item.description: Do you have a pile of old laptops in your basement, even those with cracked screens that ended up in the trash? You might be surprised to learn that those old devices, broken or not, can actually earn you some money. It’s true! Most laptops aren’t as worthless as you might think. Throwing them away or sending them to a landfill is not the best approach. Those old circuit boards and components contain harmful materials that can pollute the environment over time.
